trans-unit.source: Provides utility methods to compose and parse pack URI objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供公用程式方法來撰寫和剖析 pack URI 物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two pack URIs are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否兩個 pack Uri 是相等的。

trans-unit.source: If both `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are `null`, ComparePackUri returns 0.
When comparing pack URIs, a null URI is always less than a non-null URI.
trans-unit.target: 比較封包 Uri，空值 URI 一律是小於非空值 URI。

trans-unit.source: For cases where `firstPackUri` and `secondPackUri` are both absolute pack URIs, ComparePackUri performs the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 案例其中`firstPackUri`和`secondPackUri`是絕對的這兩組件的 Uri，ComparePackUri 執行比較。

trans-unit.source: The first pack URI.
The second pack URI.
A signed integer indicating the relationship between firstPackUri and secondPackUri.
trans-unit.target: 帶正負號的整數，表示之間的關聯性 firstPackUri 和 secondPackUri 。

trans-unit.source: Value
Meaning
Less than 0
firstPackUri is less than secondPackUri.
firstPackUri is equivalent to secondPackUri.
Greater than 0
firstPackUri is greater than secondPackUri.
Either firstPackUri or secondPackUri is not an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Either firstPackUri or secondPackUri is not an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: -or- Either firstPackUri or secondPackUri do not begin with a "pack://" scheme.
trans-unit.target: -或-任一 firstPackUri 或 secondPackUri 開頭不是 「 組件: / /"配置。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether two package part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)] are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否兩個封裝組件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]相等。

trans-unit.source: If both `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are `null`, ComparePartUri returns 0.

When comparing <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)], a null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is always less than a non-null [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 比較時<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]，null[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]一律為非 null 值大於或等於[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: For cases where `firstPartUri` and `secondPartUri` are both relative <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> URIs, ComparePartUri performs the comparison.
trans-unit.target: 案例其中`firstPartUri`和`secondPartUri`都相對<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>Uri、 ComparePartUri 執行比較。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the first <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the second <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>.
A value that indicates the relationship between firstPartUri and secondPartUri.
trans-unit.target: 值，指出之間的關聯性 firstPartUri 和 secondPartUri 。

trans-unit.source: Value
Meaning
Less than 0
firstPartUri is less than secondPartUri.
firstPartUri is equivalent to secondPartUri.
Greater than 0
firstPartUri is greater than secondPartUri.
firstPartUri or secondPartUri is not a valid part [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] syntax.
Creates a new pack URI that points to a package.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的組件指向封裝 URI。

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty.
The following table illustrates sample cases for Create.
trans-unit.target: 下表說明用於建立的範例案例。

trans-unit.source: |`packageUri`|Returned pack URI| |------------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg| Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process.
trans-unit.target: |`packageUri`|傳回組件 URI | |------------------|-----------------------| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg | pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg| | ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc | pack://ftp:、 ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg| pack://file:、、 d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg| 撰寫的組件的 URI 是多重步驟的程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,).
trans-unit.target: 例如，形成 URI 的組件的其中一個步驟是取代的正斜線 （/） 字元`packageUri`使用逗號 （，）。

trans-unit.source: For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關字串轉換和封包 Uri 的形成方式的詳細資訊，請參閱附錄 A.4 「 字串轉換範例 」 和附錄 B.3"撰寫組件 URI"下載開放式封裝慣例規格中[規格和授權下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the referenced <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
The pack URI for the referenced by the given packageUri.
trans-unit.target: Pack URI 的所參考給定 packageUri 。

trans-unit.source: packageUri is .
packageUri is not an absolute URI.

Creates a pack URI given a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] and the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package.
trans-unit.target: 建立 pack URI 給定<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]封裝中的組件。

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` may not be specified as null or empty.
trans-unit.target: `packageUri`不可以指定為 null 或空白。

trans-unit.source: If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package.
trans-unit.target: 如果`partUri`是`null`，傳回的 pack URI 指向封裝。

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for the Create method.
trans-unit.target: 下表將說明建立方法的範例案例。

trans-unit.source: |`packageUri`|`partUri`|Returned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml| Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process.
trans-unit.target: |`packageUri`|`partUri`|傳回組件 URI | |------------------|---------------|-----------------------| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/page2.xaml| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/a/page4.xaml| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/%41/%61.xml| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/%25XY.xml| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |**null**| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg| | ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc |/a/mydoc.xaml| pack://ftp:、 ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml| pack://file:、、 d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml| 撰寫的組件的 URI 是多重步驟的程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,).
trans-unit.target: 例如，形成 URI 的組件的其中一個步驟是取代的正斜線 （/） 字元`packageUri`使用逗號 （，）。

trans-unit.source: For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關字串轉換和封包 Uri 的形成方式的詳細資訊，請參閱附錄 A.4 「 字串轉換範例 」 和附錄 B.3"撰寫組件 URI"下載開放式封裝慣例規格中[規格和授權下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> in the package.
The pack URI of the given <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>.
packageUri is .
packageUri is not an absolute URI.
-or- partUri is not a valid part URI syntax.
trans-unit.target: -或-partUri不是有效的組件 URI 語法。

trans-unit.source: Creates a pack URI given a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a part in the package, and a "#" fragment to append.
trans-unit.target: 建立 pack URI 給定<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的封裝，以及要附加的"#"片段中的組件。

trans-unit.source: `packageUri` may not be specified as `null` or empty.
If `partUri` is `null`, the returned pack URI points to the package.
trans-unit.target: 如果`partUri`是`null`，傳回的 pack URI 指向封裝。

trans-unit.source: `fragment` cannot be an empty string but can be specified as `null`.
trans-unit.target: `fragment`不能是空字串，但是可以指定為`null`。

trans-unit.source: When not specified as `null`, the `fragment` string must begin with a '#' character.
trans-unit.target: 當未指定為`null`、`fragment`字串必須以 '#' 字元開頭。

trans-unit.source: For more information of the syntax of `fragment` references, see Section 3.5 "Fragment" of [RFC 3986](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊的語法`fragment`參考資料，請參閱 3.5 節 「 片段 」 的[RFC 3986](http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc3986.txt)。

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for the Create method.
trans-unit.target: 下表將說明建立方法的範例案例。

trans-unit.source: |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|Returned pack URI| |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page1.xaml|#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/page2.xaml|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page4.xaml|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%41/%61.xml|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/%25XY.xml|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|/a/page5.xaml|#summary|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| |http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04|/page1.xaml|#intro|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| |http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg|**null**|**null**|pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg| |ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc|/a/mydoc.xaml|**null**|pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml|#xref|pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| Composing a pack URI is a multi-step process.
trans-unit.target: |`packageUri`|`partUri`|`fragment`|傳回組件 URI | |------------------|---------------|----------------|-----------------------| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/page1.xaml|#intro| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg/page1.xaml#intro| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/page2.xaml|**null**| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg/page2.xaml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/a/page4.xaml|**null**| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg/a/page4.xaml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/%41/%61.xml|**null**| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg/A/a.xml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/%25XY.xml|**null**| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg/%25XY.xml| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |/a/page5.xaml|#summary| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg/a/page5.xaml#summary| | http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?pkg04 |/page1.xaml|#intro| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 packages.aspx%3fpkg04/page1.xaml#intro| | http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg |**null**|**null**| pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg| | ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc |/a/mydoc.xaml|**null**| pack://ftp:、 ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/mydoc.xaml| |file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|/a/bar.xaml|#xref| pack://file:、、 d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml#xref| 撰寫的組件的 URI 是多重步驟的程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, one step in forming a pack URI is to replace the forward slash (/) characters of the `packageUri` with commas (,).
trans-unit.target: 例如，形成 URI 的組件的其中一個步驟是取代的正斜線 （/） 字元`packageUri`使用逗號 （，）。

trans-unit.source: For more information on string conversion and how pack URIs are formed, see Appendix A.4 "String Conversion Examples" and Appendix B.3 "Composing a Pack URI" in the Open Packaging Conventions specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關字串轉換和封包 Uri 的形成方式的詳細資訊，請參閱附錄 A.4 「 字串轉換範例 」 和附錄 B.3"撰寫組件 URI"下載開放式封裝慣例規格中[規格和授權下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> in the package.
A "#" reference identifying an element within the package part.
trans-unit.target: "#"參考，用來識別封裝組件內的項目。

trans-unit.source: The pack URI that identifies the specified package, package part, and fragment.
trans-unit.target: 組件識別指定的封裝、 封裝組件，以及片段的 URI。

trans-unit.source: packageUri is .
packageUri is not an absolute URI.
-or- partUri is not a valid part URI syntax.
trans-unit.target: -或-partUri不是有效的組件 URI 語法。

trans-unit.source: -or- fragment is empty or does begin with "#".
Creates a formatted <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> is always referenced from the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> root.

The returned <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> URI is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>URI 是絕對路徑的開頭一律"/"且符合定義的語法[開放式封裝慣例規格](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for CreatePartUri.
trans-unit.target: 下表說明針對 CreatePartUri 的範例案例。

trans-unit.source: |`partUri`|Returned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |picture1.jpg|/picture1.jpg| |/picture2.jpg|/picture2.jpg| |a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml| |/b/bar.xaml|/b/bar.xaml|
The URI of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> within the package.
A formatted <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI.
Returns the normalized form of a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定的正規化的形式<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> URI。

trans-unit.source: GetNormalizedPartUri normalizes `partUri` by case-folding to uppercase (<xref:System.String.ToUpperInvariant%2A?displayProperty=fullName>) and returning the result.
trans-unit.target: GetNormalizedPartUri 正規化`partUri`由案例摺疊成大寫 (<xref:System.String.ToUpperInvariant%2A?displayProperty=fullName>)，並傳回結果。</xref:System.String.ToUpperInvariant%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI to normalize.
The normalized form of the given partUri.
trans-unit.target: 正規化的形式指定 partUri 。

trans-unit.source: partUri is .
Returns the inner URI that points to the entire package of a specified pack URI.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指向指定 pack URI 整個封裝的內部 URI。

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for GetPackageUri.
trans-unit.target: 下表說明針對 GetPackageUri 的範例案例。

trans-unit.source: |`packUri`|Returned Package URI| |---------------|--------------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.xyz| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?mypackage| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|
trans-unit.target: |`packUri`|傳回封裝 URI | |---------------|--------------------------| | pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml| http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.xyz | | pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml| http://www.proseware.com/packages.aspx?mypackage | | pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg| http://www.proseware.com/mypackage.pkg | | pack://ftp:、 ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg| ftp://ftp.proseware.com/packages/mypackage1.abc | | pack://file:、、 d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|file:///d:/packages/mypackage2.pkg|

trans-unit.source: The pack URI from which to return the URI of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Pack URI 要從中傳回的 URI <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the from the specified packUri.
Returns the URI of a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> within a specified pack URI.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 URI <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref>內指定 pack URI。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> URI is relative to the package root and is an absolute path that always starts with "/" and conforms to the syntax defined in the [Open Packaging Conventions Specification](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>URI 為相對於封裝根目錄，並且開頭一律是絕對路徑"/"且符合定義的語法[開放式封裝慣例規格](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for GetPartUri.
trans-unit.target: 下表說明針對 GetPartUri 的範例案例。

trans-unit.source: |`packUri`|Returned Part URI| |---------------|-----------------------| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml| |pack://http:,,www.proseware.com,mypackage.pkg|null| |pack://ftp:,,ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|/a/picture.jpg| |pack://file:,,,d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml|
trans-unit.target: |`packUri`|傳回部分 URI | |---------------|-----------------------| | pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.xyz/a/mydoc.xaml|/a/mydoc.xaml| | pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 packages.aspx%3fmypackage/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml| | pack://http:、 www.proseware.com、 mypackage.pkg|null| | pack://ftp:、 ftp.proseware.com,packages,mypackage1.abc/a/picture.jpg|/a/picture.jpg| | pack://file:、、 d:,packages,mypackage2.pkg/a/bar.xaml|/a/bar.xaml|

trans-unit.source: The pack URI from which to return the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> URI.
trans-unit.target: Pack URI 傳回<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> URI。

trans-unit.source: The URI of the in the given packUri, or if packUri points to a package instead of a .
trans-unit.target: The URI of the in the given packUri, or if packUri points to a package instead of a .

trans-unit.source: Returns the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the relationship part associated with a specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]與指定的關聯性組件<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: `partUri` must identify either the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> ("/") or a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> that is not a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> part.

For more information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> parts, see Section 9.3 "Relationships" in the Open Packaging Conventions Specification available for download at [Specifications and License Downloads](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>組件，請參閱可從開放式封裝慣例規格中的區段 9.3 「 關聯性 」[規格和授權下載](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Uri*> of the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> to return the URI for the associated <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref>.
The URI of the part associated with the identified by partUri.
trans-unit.target: URI 與相關聯的組件由 partUri 。

trans-unit.source: partUri is .
partUri syntax is not valid for a package part URI.
trans-unit.target: partUri封裝組件 URI 語法無效。

trans-unit.source: -or- partUri is an absolute URI.
-or- partUri references a relationship part.

Returns the relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] between two specified <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"></xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 傳回相對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]之間兩個指定<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart"> </xref> [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-urisharpplural-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for GetRelativeUri.
trans-unit.target: 下表說明針對 GetRelativeUri 的範例案例。

trans-unit.source: |`sourcePartUri`|`targetPartUri`|Returned relative URI| |---------------------|---------------------|---------------------------| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg|picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/picture.jpg|../picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg|../images/picture.jpg|
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the source part.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the target part.
The relative [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] from sourcePartUri to targetPartUri.
sourcePartUri or targetPartUri is .

Returns the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*> from the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> with a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].

The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> property of a relationship part must identify either the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A> ("/") or a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> that is not a <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>屬性關聯性的組件必須識別其中<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A>（"/"） 或<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart>也就是不<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship>.</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackagePart.Package%2A> </xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the package part "/files/document.xaml" is the source owner of the relationship part "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels", calling GetSourcePartUriFromRelationshipPartUri with the `relationshipPartUri` parameter of "/files/_rels/document.xaml.rels" returns the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A> of "/files/document.xaml".
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果封裝組件"/ files/document.xaml"關聯性的組件的來源擁有者 」 / files/_rels/document.xaml.rels"，呼叫與 GetSourcePartUriFromRelationshipPartUri`relationshipPartUri`參數"/ files/_rels/document.xaml.rels"傳回<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>的"/ files/document.xaml"。</xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the relationship part to return the <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*> from.
The of the from the relationship with the specified relationshipPartUri.
trans-unit.target: 的從具有指定的關聯性 relationshipPartUri 。

trans-unit.source: relationshipPartUri is .
relationshipPartUri is an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
-or- relationshipPartUri syntax is not valid for a .
-or- relationshipPartUri does not reference a relationship part.
-or- The <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*> of the relationship part references another relationship part (not valid, see Remarks).
trans-unit.target: -或-<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship.SourceUri*>關聯性的組件參考另一個關聯性的組件 （不正確，請參閱 < 備註 >）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> part.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，指出是否指定[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref>組件。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] to check for a <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.PackageRelationship"></xref> part.
if partUri identifies a part; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if partUri identifies a part; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: partUri is .
partUri is an absolute [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)].
-or- partUri is an invalid syntax.
Returns a part URI given a source part URI and a URI with a relative path to a target part.
trans-unit.target: 傳回部分 URI 指定的來源組件 URI 和 URI 與相對路徑的目標組件。

trans-unit.source: The following table illustrates sample cases for ResolvePartUri.
trans-unit.target: 下表說明針對 ResolvePartUri 的範例案例。

trans-unit.source: |`sourcePartUri`|`targetUri`|Returned URI| |---------------------|-----------------|------------------| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|images/picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/images/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|./picture.jpg|/mydoc/markup/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../picture.jpg|/mydoc/picture.jpg| |/mydoc/markup/page.xml|../images/picture.jpg|/mydoc/images/picture.jpg| |/|images/picture.jpg|/images/picture.jpg|
The URI of the source part, or "/" to designate the <xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref> root.
trans-unit.target: 來源組件的 URI 或"/"來指定<xref href="System.IO.Packaging.Package"></xref>根。

trans-unit.source: The relative URI to the target part.
The URI of the target part resolved between the specified SourcePartUri and the targetUri parameters.
trans-unit.target: 目標組件的 URI 解析之間指定 SourcePartUri 和 targetUri 參數。

trans-unit.source: sourcePartUri or targetUri is .
sourcePartUri is not a valid part URI.
-or- targetUri is not a valid relative URI.
Defines the pack URI scheme name "pack".
trans-unit.target: 定義組件的 URI 配置名稱"pack"。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
